function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease outbreaks and spread within buildings, leading to public health crises","Mitigation":"Implementing sustainable and green building practices to reduce the transmission of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purification technologies, and touchless fixtures","People":"Occupants of buildings, general public","Owner":"Architects, builders, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","Impact":"Inefficient usage of residential spaces during pandemics, leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Designing residential buildings to accommodate multiple functions, such as work and study spaces, with proper ventilation and separation measures","Technologies":"Flexible room configurations, efficient HVAC systems, and smart building technologies","People":"Residential building occupants, property developers","Owner":"Architects, property developers"},{"Description":"Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","Impact":"Lack of focus on residential sustainability may lead to increased vulnerability to zoonotic diseases and pandemics","Mitigation":"Prioritizing sustainable design and construction practices for residential buildings to mitigate the impact of zoonotic diseases","Technologies":"Eco-friendly building materials, energy-efficient systems, and biophilic design elements","People":"Residential building occupants, public health officials","Owner":"Building designers, government bodies"}]}
